sentences.cn: " 那好,我们走, "嬷嬷断然地说.

sentences.en: A disco isn't exactly a den of iniquity.
sentences.cn: 迪斯科舞厅并非藏污纳垢之处。

sentences.en: And so he went on scolding to his den beneath.
sentences.cn: 他就这么骂骂咧咧地回到他的窝里.

sentences.en: He enjoys reading in his den.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢在他的幽静小巧的书房里看书.

sentences.en: He finds himself in a den of ruffians.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己在流氓的巢穴中.

sentences.en: He resolved at last to brave the lioness in her den.
sentences.cn: 最后,他决定斗胆到狮穴里去会会那只母狮子.

sentences.en: I had endured in that den.
sentences.cn: 我在那令人寡欢的地方忍耐着.

sentences.en: McCaul was highly amused by his trip into the Lion's den.
sentences.cn: 这次深入虎穴使麦克考尔得意极了.

sentences.en: Not exactly -- not exactly . We'll take it to my den. "
sentences.cn: 不行,这样 不妥, 我们把箱子拿到我那里去. ”

sentences.en: The only way to catch tiger cubs is to go into tiger's den.
The police have found a den of thieves.
The tiger retired to its den.
They lured the bear out of its den.
This airport is a den of thives.

trans.tran_cn: 兽穴，贼窝，简陋污秽的小室，书斋
trans.tran_en: the home of some animals, for example lions or  fox es

trans.tran_cn: 藏到洞里；住在肮脏简陋的小房间里
